mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tasks ( id INT auto_increment PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, parentId INT, userId INT, name varchar(30) NOT NULL, description text, startDate TIMESTAMP, endDate TIMESTAMP, timeSpent INT, progress INT(3), daily BOOLEAN(1), closed BOOLEAN(1), FOREIGN KEY(parentId) REFERENCES tasks(id), FOREIGN KEY(userId) REFERENCES users(id) )

INSERT INTO tasks ( parentId, userId, name, description, startDate, endDate, timeSpent, progress, daily, closed ) VALUES ( #{parentId}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{timeSpent}, #{progress}, #{daily}, #{closed} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tasks SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, timeSpent = #{timeSpent}, progress = #{progress}, daily = #{daily}, closed = #{closed} WHERE id = #{id}
